doc.title: Fast Food
doc.plot: "Fast Food" is a short, independent documentary that takes a whimsical look at the odd side of Mobile Marketing. Most people know and love the Oscar Mayer WienerMobile from their childhood and still feel the excitement when they see it on the road. However, most people haven't even heard of the rest of the fleet of Product Mobiles that are out on the highways of America bringing smiles to both children and adults. "Fast Food" tours these four wheeled wonders inside and out and takes a look and why these kings of the road bring out the kids in all of us.
